DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose study evaluate safety tolerability desvenlafaxine succinate SR healthy male female Chinese subject . The amount drug body effect drug also evaluate .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Safety , Tolerability Pharmacokinetics Desvenlafaxine Succinate SR Healthy Chinese Male Females
DOC.criteria: Inclusion : 1 . Men nonpregnant , nonlactating woman , 18 45 year age inclusive study day 1 . 2 . Healthy determine investigator basis medical history , physical examination , clinical laboratory test result , vital sign , 12lead electrocardiogram ( ECG ) 3 . Nonsmoker smoker few 10 cigarette ( half pack ) day . Exclusion : 1 . Any significant cardiovascular , hepatic , renal , respiratory , gastrointestinal , endocrine , immunologic , dermatologic , hematologic , neurologic , psychiatric disease . 2 . History epilepsy seizure disorder ( except history single childhood febrile seizure ) .
